deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
@dev fallback function to receive funds sent to this escrow contract
 @dev this function then calls the internal fundContract() function
@dev finalizeTrade called internally to distribute the escrow funds

@dev fallback function to receive funds sent to this escrow contract
 @dev this function then calls the internal fundContract() function
@dev finalizeTrade called internally to distribute the escrow funds

params._purchaseAmount: uint amount of ETH being paid to seller

buyerFinalize().details: Once both finalizations are received the funds are released accordinglyThe logic works such that if one party finalizes the contract checks      to see if the other party has already finalized.

fundContract(address,uint256).details: called internally to add received funds to the respective party balanceif the _funder's respective balance is less than required the _amount is       added to their EscrowedFunds balancefinally, the checkFundingStatus() function is called internally

params._amount: uint of ETH that was send by the _funder
params._funder: address that sent ETH to fund escrow

buyerFinalize().notice: Once fully funded, both parties must finalize the transaction
